title: Seated Single / One Leg Balance / Holds
description: Seated Single / One Leg Balance / Holds Equipment required Primary muscle group(s) Seat yourself comfortably on a solid chair, with your back straight and unsupported. Keep your feet planted about hip-width apart. Gently grip the chair seat under your thighs if this feels more comfortable for you. When ready, keeping your back straight, lift one knee bringing it towards your chest.
